council_address.description: Council contract handles the submission and execution of proposals

incentives_address.description: Incentives contract handles incentives to depositors on the red bank

oracle_address.description: Oracle contract provides prices in uusd for assets used in the protocol

owner.description: Contract owner (has special permissions to update parameters)

protocol_admin_address.description: Protocol admin is the Cosmos level contract admin that has permissions to migrate contracts

protocol_rewards_collector_address.description: Protocol Rewards Collector receives and distributes protocl rewards

red_bank_address.description: Red Bank contract handles user's depositing/borrowing and holds the protocol's liquidity

safety_fund_address.description: Safety fund contract accumulates UST to protect the protocol from shortfall events

staking_address.description: Staking address handles Mars staking and xMars minting

treasury_address.description: Treasury contract accumulates protocol fees that can be spent by the council through the voting of proposals
